about_the_game:
Try easy and comfortable gestures by using only a mouse. You DON'T need to purchase any extra devices for these functions.
Select specific gestures for each programs. You can also disable them for certain programs.
When you are using a laptop, you can use these gestures with your touchpad on your laptop!

Features

  • Easy Configuration
    You can easily set sepcific gesture for certain programs by using Gesture Configurator.

  • Gesture Customization
    You can edit 16 gestures that perfectly fit you.

  • Use with Touchpad
    The mouse is not the only device for the gestures. You can also use the touchpad on your laptop to access them.

  • Various Commands
    You can set 22 different commands for your gestures.

  • Easy Installation
    You only need to install Gest! for all applications.

  • Edit Default Shortcuts
    You can set specific shortcut to gestures.
